english.segment1: Give me a old school beat. This is what we gon' do with it
english.segment2: I gotta be feel with the Holy Ghost. Knot that ties me from my head to my toes. You said if I pray You would deliver me. Break those chains, Lord, that were bindin' me
english.segment3: Hey, only You can make me right. Lord, I'm askin' You to change my life
english.segment4: I need You. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time
english.segment5: I wanna be free with Your Holy Spirit. And there are days when I just can't feel it. But I know You're there, You said You'd never leave me. And I must say, Lord You've been good to me
english.segment6: Lord, I'm askin' You for help. You've been better to me that I've been to myself. I need You to touch me
english.segment7: Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time
english.segment8: Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time. Touch me one more time
english.segment9: One more time. One more time. One more time. I need You to touch me
english.segment10: One more time. One more time. One more time. I need You to touch me
english.segment11: People right there clap your hands. I've just got a question. Anybody need a touch?
english.segment12: Anybody need a touch, a touch. Need a touch, hey, one more time. Anybody need a touch, a touch. Need a touch, hey, one more time
english.segment13: Anybody need a touch, a touch. Need a touch, hey, one more time. Anybody need a touch, a touch. Need a touch, hey, one more time
english.segment14: I need it, I need it, I need it. I need it, I need it, I need it. I need it, I need it, I need it. I need it, I need it, I need it. I need it, I need it, I need it
